messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines if a punch results in regular damage?
Less than half the character’s maximum hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of damage is equal to or more than half the character’s maximum hit points?
Equal to or more than half the character’s maximum hit points, it is a Major Wound.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of more than the character’s maximum hit points?
More than the character’s maximum hit points, the result is death.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of damage is more than the character’s maximum hit points?
More than the character’s maximum hit points, the result is death.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the minimum amount of damage required for regular damage?
Less than half the character’s maximum hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a single attack that deals damage equal to or more than half the character’s maximum hit points?
A Major Wound
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a single attack that deals more than the character’s maximum hit points?
Death
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a character die as a result of regular damage?
No
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the difference between regular damage and a major wound?
A punch is likely to result in regular damage, whereas a gunshot is more likely to inflict a major wound.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of regular damage on a character?
Regular damage has no significant effect on the character until current hit points are reduced to zero.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the definition of regular damage?
Regular damage is the result of any single attack that deals damage equal to less than half the character’s maximum hit points in a single blow.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the definition of a major wound?
A Major Wound results when an attack delivers an amount of damage equal to or greater than half of the character’s maximum hit points in a single attack.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a Major Wound in combat?
A Major Wound results when an attack delivers an amount of damage equal to or greater than half of the character's maximum hit points in a single attack.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a character that has received a Major Wound?
The character immediately falls prone and makes a successful CON roll to avoid falling unconscious.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a character to die?
If current hit points fall to zero while the Major Wound box is ticked, the character is dying.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What damage will inflicts a Major Wound on Harvey?
Damage of 8 or more will inflict a Major Wound on Harvey.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a character's current hit points fall to zero?
The character is unconscious.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of cumulative damage once a character's current hit points fall to zero?
Cumulative damage ceases to be tracked.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a character with zero hit points if further damage is attempted?
Any sincere attempt to kill the unconscious character should succeed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is one of the three conditions that zero hit points can indicate, similar to the triage model?
One of three conditions
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to cumulative damage tracking when a character's hit points fall to zero?
Cumulative damage ceases to be tracked once current hit points have fallen to zero.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of taking a wound equal to a character's maximum hit points, assuming the character is uninjured?
This would be a major wound.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if an amount of damage greater than a character's maximum hit points is taken in one attack?
Death is inevitable.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect on a character if they have taken a Major Wound and are not receiving First Aid?
The character will soon die.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a character with zero hit points?
The character is unconscious.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of an uninjured character taking a wound equal to their maximum hit points?
The character will soon die unless First Aid is administered.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what conditions is death inevitable?
If an amount of damage greater than the character’s maximum hit points is taken in one attack.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does First Aid need to be delivered to be effective?
Within one hour.
